contentList.content: Sealed by Lorroakan's formidable arcane sigil, this bag cradles treasures from Sorcerous Sundries – each artifact personally imbued with power by the great wizard in his moments of solitude, the enchantments resonating still with the delicate whispers of his masterful craft.

The discerning eye of a Baldurian would instantly recognise their homeland's craft: here lies that splendid, tightly-woven fabric, resilient enough to turn a blade's edge, yet bearing the gentle caress of finest Eastern silk. The hem, adorned with threads of precious metal, speaks of the city's renowned craftsmanship. Yet there is something more – a mysterious shimmer dances across the cloak's surface, an enchantment that seems to whisper ancient tales to those who dare to look closer.
At the start of combat, you gain +[1] to AC for [2] turns.

By getting drunk in combat, you become invisible until the end of your next turn.

By becoming Surprised, you immediately remove this effect.
Master's Cloak of the Mountain Beasts
Attack Rolls against you have Disadvantage. Every turn in combat you must succeed a Constitution Saving Throw([1]), or be Petrified for good.
If you succeed a Constitution Saving Throw([1]) in combat, you remove Petrification.

When casting a spell, regain [2].

Triggers no more than once per turn.
When you are healed, become hastened for [1] turns with a [2]% chance.

When a foe attacks you, there is a [1]% chance of releasing a deadly energy that will deal [2] to you and an attacker.

Effectiveness increases every level.
Master's Cloak of the Swamp Toad

You are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to[1],[2] and[3]. Attackers can't score a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against you.
While Downed, you gain Unbreakable Tenacity for [1] turns.

When a foe deals you[1], you gain [2] charges of the Furious Light.

Master's Cloak of the Grey Hare
Performing a Jump in combat, you gain [1] charges of Blood Rush (up to [2] charges).
Your HP increases by [1] for each charge of this effect. Dispels at the end of combat.
After a Long Rest there is a [1]% chance you recieve Twisted Dreams or Desperate Dreams for [2] turns.
You regain [1] at the end of each turn, but suffer a Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma Saving Throws.
You gain Advantage on Attack Rolls but your maximum HP is reduced by [1]%.
Master's Cloak of the Cave Ogre

When you are Shoved, become giant for [1] turns.

Master's Cloak of the Arena Skirmisher

While under sunlight, you gain Mother's Protection for [1] turns.

Master's Cloak of the Unburied Soul

Casting Stoneskin or Guardian of Faith regains points spent on them.

Master's Cloak of the Wizard Slayer
If the target has a [1] Level Spell Slot or higher — you automatically score a Critical Hit against them.

Attacker's HP is used as a base.

[1] dealt to you is reduced by [2].

Beasts suffer Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.
Master's Cloak of the Polar Bear

Duration of effect can be stacked.

You become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to any damage.
You are Immune to Blindness and disperse malicious clouds around you.

Lava has no effect on you. When you enter lava, recieve Magma Shield.
+[1] to AC as long as you standing in lava.
Master's Cloak of the Vampire Lord
As you move, you leave behind a bloody cloud.

A foe attacking you must succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw([1]) or fall prone.
